sn47.23:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca anando ayasma ca bhaddo pataliputte viharanti kukkutarame.
sn47.23:1.2: Atha kho ayasma bhaddo sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi.
sn47.23:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma bhaddo ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
sn47.23:1.4: “ko nu kho, avuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaparihanam hoti?
sn47.23:1.5: Ko nu kho, avuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaaparihanam hoti”ti?
sn47.23:2.2: Bhaddako kho te, avuso bhadda, ummango, bhaddakam patibhanam, kalyani paripuccha.
sn47.23:2.4: ‘ko nu kho, avuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaparihanam hoti?
sn47.23:2.5: Ko panavuso ananda, hetu, ko paccayo yena saddhammaaparihanam hoti’”ti?
sn47.23:2.7: “Catunnam kho, avuso, satipatthananam abhavitatta abahulikatatta saddhammaparihanam hoti.
sn47.23:2.8: Catunnanca kho, avuso, satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta saddhammaaparihanam hoti.
sn47.23:3.2: Idhavuso, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.23:3.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.23:3.6: Imesam kho, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam abhavitatta abahulikatatta saddhammaparihanam hoti.
sn47.23:3.7: Imesanca kho, avuso, catunnam satipatthananam bhavitatta bahulikatatta saddhammaaparihanam hoti”ti.
